DocAttribute.Name: OffsetDirection
DocAttribute.Documentation: Orientation of the offset; shall be perpendicular to the parent layer set direction.

DocAttribute.Name: OffsetValues
DocAttribute.Documentation: The numerical value of layer offset, in the direction of the axis assigned by the attribute _OffsetDirection_. The _OffsetValues[1]_ identifies the offset from the lower position along the axis direction (normally the start of the standard extrusion), the _OffsetValues[2]_ identifies the offset from the upper position along the axis direction (normally the end of the standard extrusion).
